title: Julius Engelhard
text: Julius Engelhard (18 July 1883 – 13 December 1964) was a German <a href="painter">painter</a>. His work was part of the art competitions at the <a href="1932%20Summer%20Olympics">1932 Summer Olympics</a> and the <a href="1936%20Summer%20Olympics">1936 Summer Olympics</a>.
